comments:
Build I20030205

I started my existing workspace.
Clicked on the action.
The UI came up.
I made my selection.
Pressed OK

==> NPE, nothing happens.

Note: Opening a new window with a fresh perspective and adding the CVS action
sets does not fix the problem.

This used to work with I20030129
